item.title: Passive Houses Get Good Graphic Explanation
item.description:
Passive Houses Get Good Graphic Explanation

The New York Times has a great graphic explanation of the principles of the Passive House, "airtight buildings that use heat from appliances and even the occupants' bodies for warmth." The Times notes that while they are popular in Germany and Scandinavia, they have not caught on in the US, where it seems that the "green gizmo" approach of adding photovoltaics and heat pumps rules over simplicity and efficiency.
